author: Daniel Keane
title: For Marty McCarthy, coronavirus quarantine is strange but far from 'prison-like'
description: The former Country Hour presenter became sick on a recent flight home the United States and is sticking up for the nation's quarantine restrictions, after criticisms were levelled against them.
content:
Posted 
April 01, 2020 14:55:01
In a hotel about 10 minutes away from Sydney's CBD, Marty McCarthy has been in quarantine, getting regular checks from medical staff as he nurses a case of COVID-19.
